title: Genigma: Generative Puzzles
text:
Welcome to this generative puzzle book! Created using the open-source programming language R, this book is completely free! And here’s the best part: it never runs out! If you’re craving more puzzles, just come back tomorrow. This book refreshes itself every day, generating 9 brand-new mandalas, 18 sudoku, 18 word finders, and 18 crossword puzzles for you to enjoy.
Click here to download today’s unique puzzle book!
